actions.name: CreateCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to create a campaign

actions.name: DeleteCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a campaign

actions.name: DeleteCampaignChannelSubtypeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the channel subtype configuration of a campaign

actions.name: DeleteCampaignCommunicationLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the communication limits configuration of a campaign

actions.name: DeleteCampaignCommunicationTime
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the communication time configuration of a campaign

actions.name: DeleteConnectInstanceConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to remove configuration information for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteConnectInstanceIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to remove integration information for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DeleteInstanceOnboardingJob
actions.description: Grants permission to remove onboarding job for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: DescribeCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to describe a specific campaign

actions.name: GetCampaignState
actions.description: Grants permission to get state of a campaign

actions.name: GetCampaignStateBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to get state of campaigns

actions.name: GetConnectInstanceConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to get configuration information for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: GetInstanceOnboardingJobStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to get onboarding job status for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListCampaigns
actions.description: Grants permission to provide summary of all campaigns

actions.name: ListConnectInstanceIntegrations
actions.description: Grants permission to provide summary of all integrations with an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

actions.name: PauseCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to pause a campaign

actions.name: PutConnectInstanceIntegration
actions.description: Grants permission to put an integration configuration with an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: PutDialRequestBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to create dial requests for the specified campaign

actions.name: PutOutboundRequestBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to create dial requests for the specified campaign

actions.name: PutProfileOutboundRequestBatch
actions.description: Grants permission to create profile outbound requests for the specified campaign

actions.name: ResumeCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to resume a campaign

actions.name: StartCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to start a campaign

actions.name: StartInstanceOnboardingJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start onboarding job for an Amazon Connect instance

actions.name: StopCampaign
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a campaign

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

actions.name: UpdateCampaignChannelSubtypeConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the channel subtype configuration of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignCommunicationLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to update the communication limits configuration of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignCommunicationTime
actions.description: Grants permission to update the communication time configuration of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignDialerConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the dialer configuration of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignFlowAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update the flow association of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignName
actions.description: Grants permission to update the name of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignOutboundCallConfig
actions.description: Grants permission to update the outbound call configuration of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignSchedule
actions.description: Grants permission to update the schedule of a campaign

actions.name: UpdateCampaignSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update the source of a campaign
